name: The Dance Floor is Lava
description:
Made for Music Game Jam 2018. A rhythm based game. Listen to the beats, jump to avoid the lava, and collect all the coins. Can you make it to the exit without getting hurt?

Use arrow keys to move. Press space bar to reset game. 

(If you lose all your health, you can still make it to the end!)

I only had time for 1 song. Planning to expand this to include other songs, and a level editor!
